publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2786# Miss Annabel Goldie: Renfrewshire Economyâ€”That the Parliament notes with pleasure the very positive Special Report on the Renfrewshire economy in business a.m. on 25 February 2002; congratulates all agencies involved in creating this economic success, and commends the Renfrewshire model to the rest of Scotland as an example of good practice. Supported by: David Mundell*, Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*, John Young*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2786# Renfrewshire Economy (lodged on 26 February 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Brian Monteith*, John Scott*, Bill Aitken*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2786# Renfrewshire Economy (lodged on 26 February 2002) Trish Godman*, Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-2786# Miss Annabel Goldie: Renfrewshire Economy-That the Parliament notes with pleasure the very positive Special Report on the Renfrewshire economy in business a.m. on 25 February 2002; congratulates all agencies involved in creating this economic success, and commends the Renfrewshire model to the rest of Scotland as an example of good practice. Supported by: David Mundell, Murdo Fraser, Phil Gallie, John Young, Mr Murray Tosh, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Jamie Stone, Fiona McLeod, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Brian Monteith, John Scott, Bill Aitken, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Mr Keith Harding
S1M-2786# Renfrewshire Economy (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mary Scanlon*
